cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on July 29, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8463, Millennium Challenge Corporation Eligibility Expansion Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 121 (Thursday, July 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CASTRO of Texas:
H.R. 8463.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H7067]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Millennium Challenge Corporation Eligibility Expansion Act
